title: [Large-scale] Workshop on Quality Design for Mobile-based Online Mathematics Lectures

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online learning platforms and foundational knowledge of mathematics education theory
context.additional_context: A process for preservice teachers to acquire competencies in designing effective mathematics instruction in smartphone environments, developing quality control strategies through team collaboration and self-directed problem-solving.

learning_goals: Learners can develop three checklists for designing mobile-optimized mathematics lectures
Learners can apply two or more instructional material creation methods—such as video production and quiz design—in limited-technology environments
Learners can design a feedback system for quality management in online lectures through team collaboration

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
